Entries.NPC.cs.4001: นักวิจัยทางคลินิค ที่ผมรู้จักคนนึง บอกผมว่าผลไม้นั่น มีสรรพคุณทางการแพทย์ ที่เยี่ยมยอดมากเลยล่ะ#$b#ผมอยากให้คุณไว้น่ะ... อ่า แน่นอนว่าเพราะผมอยากให้คุณสุขภาพดี  แล้วก็เป็นการแสดงออก ถึงความรู้สึกที่ผมมีให้คุณด้วย$l#$b#@... ผมเป็นคน ที่เผลอทำอะไรเป็นกิจวัตร ง่ายมากเลยน่ะ ถ้าจะให้พูดกันตรงๆ ก็ปลีกตัว เป็นกิจวัตร$s#$b#ขนาดได้อยู่ในสังคม ที่แน่นแฟ้นขนาดนี้ ผมยังเคยรู้สึกโดดเดี่ยวเลย ... แต่ก็ไม่สามารถ รวบรวมความกล้า เปลี่ยนวิถีชีวิตตัวเองได้$s#$b#แต่แล้วผมก็พบกับ คนที่สุดยอด เปล่งประกาย และกล้าหาญ...#$b#คนที่พร้อมจะเสี่ยง เพื่อพบกับความสุข ถึงแม้ว่ามันจะหมายถึง การต้องเริ่มชีวิตใหม่ก็ตาม ...#$b#คนที่ สอนวิธีโผบินให้ผม$l#$b#ผมรักคุณนะ @ ผมไม่เคยเจอเพื่อน แบบคุณเลย ได้มาเป็น {{RelationshipLabel}} กับคุณ ชีวิตผมเปลี่ยนแปลง ไปในทางที่ดีขึ้นมากเลย$l

Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.#$e#You know, @... Before we met, I thought being a bachelor was the reason I felt lonely and unfulfilled.$s#$e#But since we've been {{RelationshipLabel}}, there's no doubt in my mind... What we have together is exactly what I need. I love you so much.
Entries.funReturn_Harvey: I had a nice day. It's refreshing to spend some time alone now and then. Did you have a good day, @?
Entries.Outdoor_3: @... you mean the world to me.
Entries.Good_1: You rescued me from a life of loneliness, and filled the emptiness in my heart. Thank you.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: I woke up early, but I made sure not to wake you. You need your rest!
Entries.spring_23: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow?$s#$e#It's always a little embarrassing.$7

Entries.Rainy_Night_0: How was your day, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}? I was going to do the dishes but I got absorbed in the latest issue of "Knee Surgery Enthusiast".
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: You look a little soggy, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your doctor and friend, I consider your health and safety my top priority!
Entries.fall_1: Make sure and diversify your harvests this fall, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.#$e#Or just grow cranberries... It's really up to you. What do I know?
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I made us a nice healthy dinner. Only fresh, wholesome ingredients from the valley! [212 214 225 209 200]$h#$e#Enjoy, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.

Entries.winter_1: The air is very dry during winter. That's why our skin tends to become irritated.#$e#Truffle oil is an excellent remedy for that.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: You look exhausted, you poor thing. Why don't you sit down and let me bring you something to drink?

Entries.Rainy_Day_Harvey: Make sure you stay dry today, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. I don't want you to become hypothermic.
Entries.jobReturn_Harvey: #$c .5#*Phew*... I'm exhausted...$s#Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. How was your day?#$e#My patients are still healthy, so it was a good day.
Entries.summer_Harvey: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, @... That can really damage your skin.
Entries.spouseRoom_Harvey: #$c .5#No air-traffic this morning. But it's still fun to break out the equipment now and then.#$e#I'm working on a new model plane. It's so much more relaxing here than in my old apartment.

Entries.Indoor_Night_Harvey: You look like you could use a full night's sleep tonight.#$e#Doctor's orders... It's good for your brain!
Entries.Outdoor_Harvey: This is so much nicer than being cooped up in the clinic all day.#$e#I love watching you on the farm. You throw yourself into the work so completely. It's a good reminder of the simple joy of physical exertion.

Entries.Harvey_spouse: Hi, @. I was hoping you'd find me here!$h
I'm dreaming of our warm fire back home...
I'm feeling a little overwhelmed... thank goodness for this crisp air...$8

Entries.marriageJob.000: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. What are you doing at the clinic?#$e#Ah, you just came to see me. That's nice.$h
Hi, {{TermofEndearment}}. What are you doing at the clinic?#$e#Ah, you just came to see me. That's nice.$h

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Harvey: Movie tickets? Well... yes, I'd love to go with you!$h#$e#It's good to do things like this. I don't want life as {{RelationshipLabel}} to get boring for you!

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Harvey: When I'm next to you, I'm not even scared of falling off this cliff and dashing onto the sharp rocks below...$l"/jump Harvey/shake Harvey 1000/pause 1000/speak Harvey "...$8#$b#...I'm all right. I still have those moments where the fear spikes, but it's easier to get past them than it used to be.#$b#And that's all thanks to you. I... I love and admire you very much, @.$l

Entries.Event.cs.1627: I've been looking forward to it! Fresh air, exercise, and a friend to share them with... days like this are good for the body and soul!$h

Entries.harveyBalloon: @,^I need to ask you for a favor. Could you meet me by the railroad tracks? ^   -Harvey[#]Harvey's Favor

Having an active social life is healthy for the brain.#$b#But remember, I'm always here for you if you need someone to talk to!$l"(break)speak Harvey "That makes sense. There's lots to do in this valley! ...And I know how hard you work.#$b#Just remember to take breaks! When you're so busy, it's easy to get burnt out from exhaustion."(break)speak Harvey "Ah... I have that problem, too. The boundary between days can blur together... it's hard to keep track of everything!"(break)speak Harvey "Took the day off, huh? I like to do nice things for you! It makes me happy."/pause 1000/speak Harvey "I know I say this a lot, but... us becoming {{RelationshipLabel}} was the best thing that ever happened to me!$l"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100/end dialogue Harvey "That was filling. I'm gonna sleep well..."

Entries.Thu10: It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should.$s#$e#If I didn't live alone I think it would be easier.$s
Entries.summer_Thu10: I wasn't sure if I would ever make any meaningful friendships here.#$e#But then, out of everywhere in the world, you moved to Stardew Valley... It's enough to make even someone like me feel a sense of destiny about it.$l
Entries.summer_Fri10: I went into this profession anticipating that it might be dehumanizing.#$e#What I've found has been quite the opposite.
Entries.fall_Sat10: What, me and Maru? No, of course not.$8#$e#I'm... I'm very fond of her, but she's my employee. I would never want to make her feel pressured.$s

Entries.Thu10: It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should.$s#$e#If I didn't live alone I think it would be easier.$s
Entries.summer_Thu10: I wasn't sure if I would ever make any meaningful friendships here.#$e#But then, out of everywhere in the world, you moved to Stardew Valley... It's enough to make even someone like me feel a sense of destiny about it.
Entries.summer_Fri10: I went into this profession anticipating that it might be dehumanizing.#$e#What I've found has been quite the opposite.
Entries.fall_Sat10: What, me and Maru? No, of course not.$8#$e#I'm... I'm very fond of her, but she's my employee. I would never want to make her feel pressured.$s
Entries.Tue10: Don't overwork yourself, @. Doctor's orders!#$e#Your health is important to me.
Entries.winter_Sat10: *Sigh*... I'm starting to feel kind of old...#$e#The older you get the more memories you're burdened with. It can be overwhelming.$s#$e#I think I'll stay younger with you around.

Entries.Good_2: I was drawn to you from the moment you moved here. Intimidated, too... but somehow I knew that being part of your life would enrich mine.$l
Entries.Good_3: You look hale and healthy today! I'm glad.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: #$c .5#I'll never forget how you helped me through those first terrifying minutes of our balloon ride.$l#I took it easy today... spent some time reading books, fiddled with my radio, and worked on a model airplane. Not a bad day at all!
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I think we're all striving to reach some kind of balance in life. An equilibrium of complexity.#$e#$c .5#For one thing, just taking the walk into work helps me a lot. I got so lazy when I just had to roll out of bed and head downstairs.#For me, moving here was exactly what I needed to find that balance.$l
Entries.Outdoor_2: #$c .5#I may not be the most exciting guy, but I'll be a loyal friend to you for the rest of my life.$l#This is perfect. The sun's not too bright yet, and I don't even need my sunglasses.
Entries.Outdoor_3: #$c .5#Would I get mornings like this, living just about anywhere else? ...I don't think so.$h#@... you mean the world to me.$l
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#You know, @... Before we met, I thought being a bachelor was the reason I felt lonely and unfulfilled.$s#$e#But since we've been {{RelationshipLabel}}, there's no doubt in my mind... What we have together is exactly what I need. I love you so much.$l
Entries.funReturn_Harvey: #$c .5#Oh! Good timing. I just got home, too. How was your day?#I had a nice day. It's refreshing to spend some time alone now and then. Did you have a good day, @?
Entries.spring_25: Seeing you dash around with all that energy has actually motivated me to go for jogs more than I used to.#$e#No more dance aerobics, though. I just felt too self-conscious exercising in front of my patients.$s
Entries.summer_17: @, of course, I don't demand that you have the exact same moral philosophy that I do.$h#$b#You love me, and I love you, and that's all I need from you.$l
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: #$c .5#I woke up early, but I made sure not to wake you. You need your rest!#Ohh... I know if I offer you a raincoat, you'll just say no, won't you?$s
Entries.spring_23: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow?$s#$e#It's always a little embarrassing.$7

Entries.Good_2: I was drawn to you from the moment you moved here. Intimidated, too... but somehow I knew that being part of your life would enrich mine.
Entries.Good_3: You look hale and healthy today! I'm glad.$h
Entries.Good_1: You rescued me from a life of loneliness, and filled the emptiness in my heart. Thank you.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: #$c .5#I'll never forget how you helped me through those first terrifying minutes of our balloon ride.#I took it easy today... spent some time reading books, fiddled with my radio, and worked on a model airplane. Not a bad day at all!
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I think we're all striving to reach some kind of balance in life. An equilibrium of complexity.#$e#$c .5#For one thing, just taking the walk into work helps me a lot. I got so lazy when I just had to roll out of bed and head downstairs.#For me, moving here was exactly what I needed to find that balance.
Entries.Outdoor_2: #$c .5#I may not be the most exciting guy, but I'll be a loyal friend to you for the rest of my life.#This is perfect. The sun's not too bright yet, and I don't even need my sunglasses.
Entries.Outdoor_3: #$c .5#Would I get mornings like this, living just about anywhere else? ...I don't think so.$h#@... you mean the world to me.
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.#$e#You know, @... Before we met, I thought being a bachelor was the reason I felt lonely and unfulfilled.$s#$e#But since we've been {{RelationshipLabel}}, there's no doubt in my mind... What we have together is exactly what I need. I love you so much.
Entries.funReturn_Harvey: #$c .5#Oh! Good timing. I just got home, too. How was your day?#I had a nice day. It's refreshing to spend some time alone now and then. Did you have a good day, @?
Entries.spring_25: Seeing you dash around with all that energy has actually motivated me to go for jogs more than I used to.#$e#No more dance aerobics, though. I just felt too self-conscious exercising in front of my patients.$s
Entries.summer_17: @, of course, I don't demand that you have the exact same moral philosophy that I do.$h#$b#You love me, and I love you, and that's all I need from you.
Entries.summer_4: The weather reports are already saying next week's going to be hotter, even if it rains. Be careful out there!#$e#Oh, I trust you'll be fine. Just... allow me this?
Entries.fall_4: I have an oath not to share medical records with anyone. And yes, that even means you.#$e#Well, at least you know I'm good at keeping promises.$h#$b#And of course, I have a lifelong promise to keep to you.
Entries.winter_16: When you opened that letter from your grandfather... you know, the one you told me about?#$b#It's strange to think how I didn't even know you then, but that moment changed the direction of my life forever.#$e#It makes you think... what else is going on in the world right now, that we don't know about, but will change our lives forever?
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: #$c .5#I woke up early, but I made sure not to wake you. You need your rest!#Ohh... I know if I offer you a raincoat, you'll just say no, won't you?$s
Entries.spring_23: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow?$s#$e#It's always a little embarrassing.$7

Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your doctor and friend, I consider your health and safety my top priority!
Entries.fall_1: Make sure and diversify your harvests this fall, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.#$e#Or just grow cranberries... It's really up to you. What do I know?
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I made us a nice healthy dinner. Only fresh, wholesome ingredients from the valley! [212 214 225 209 200]$h#$e#Enjoy, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: #$c .5#Just a little secret, but... I had a couple pieces of candy this evening. Everything in moderation, including moderation, right?$h#How was your day, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}? I was going to do the dishes but I got absorbed in the latest issue of "Knee Surgery Enthusiast".
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: I made us a nice healthy dinner. Only fresh, wholesome ingredients from the valley! [212 214 225 209 200]$h#$e#This is one of my favorites. Enjoy!

Entries.winter_1: The air is very dry during winter. That's why our skin tends to become irritated.#$e#Truffle oil is an excellent remedy for that.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: #$c .5#I got in a little bit of exercise today. Did you? ...Er, well, of course you did.#You look exhausted, you poor thing. Why don't you sit down and let me bring you something to drink?
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: #$c .5#Sometimes, my brain turns on at this hour. I've developed a pretty good habit, though, of resisting staying up late.#It's stressful to be a doctor, so it's really great to live somewhere as relaxing as %farm Farm.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: #$c .5#This weather is perfect for a quiet night in.#You look a little soggy, @. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?
#$c .5#You look a little soggy, @. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?#Hey... Let's go to bed early...$l

Entries.winter_15: {{TermofEndearment}}, I think I'll head down to the Night Market tonight.#$e#Would you like to come? I've never gone with someone before.$h

Entries.marriage_saloon3: Even though I'm the local doctor, I don't have many friends, do I?$s#$b#Maybe it's just hard to be friends with someone who knows everything about your health.$s#$b#But you... you never hesitated to talk to me. I'm really grateful for that.$l
Entries.marriage_saloon6: @, you're soaked!$8#$b#Come sit with me and warm up.
Entries.marriage_clinic4: @, it's nice of you to pay me a visit at work!$h#$b#Your company is greatly appreciated.$l
Entries.marriage_saloon: Hi, @! I come here to relax when it rains.#$b#So, how was your day? Hope you stayed dry.$h
Entries.marriage_radio2: I thought I just heard something...$10#$b#Oh, it's you! Hi, @!$h
Entries.marriage_clinic: Aside from their yearly appointments, people barely come in here. I don't think anyone would would notice if I took the day off.#$b#Still, Mayor Lewis is using our tax money on this clinic so it's my duty to be here regardless.#$b#That's just the life of a doctor.$h

Entries.marriage_read4: My throat's parched, I need a drink.#$b#Want to go down to the saloon together?$h
Entries.marriage_nm: My favorite part of the Night Market?#$b#Well of course, it's the free coffee!$h#$b#Well... it was the free coffee. Now it's spending time with you.
Entries.marriage_16: So many visitors, I hope no one gets sick...$8#$b#Uh... I-I'd like to head in with you if that's okay. I don't know where to go.$s
Entries.marriage_25: I was planning to help set up, but it looks like they're already done.$s#$b#When you're ready, I'll go in with you.

Entries.marriage_read3: I'm gonna finish this chapter before it gets too dark to see.#$b#I'll see you back home soon, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.
Entries.marriage_saloon5: Be careful working in the rain, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Especially now when it's dark outside.#$b#Hey, Doctor's orders! I don't want to see you slip and hurt yourself.$h
Entries.marriage_13: In my old apartment I could peek out my window and see where they were hiding all the eggs.#$b#I know most of the reused hiding spots by now.#$b#I'm sorry, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}, but if I tell you then I have to tell everyone else.$h
